metadata.synopsis: AD about a wall with protective charms and prayers written by Harpers attacking Ketheric's Outpost.
metadata.how_to_trigger: SCL_Main_AApproach the TollhouseOn the right you will see prayers written on the wall. Click on them.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Prayers, charms, battle cries - the Harpers' work. They were primed for combat.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: A commemoration of battles long past. Like the town itself.
